import React from 'react'; import '../../../App.css'; import './Profile.css' import Footer from '../../Footer'; import Info_Navbar from '../../Info_Navbar'; import Navbar from '../../Navbar'; function Profile(props) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState({ hid: "", password: "", }) const handleChange = e =>{ const {name, value} = e.target setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } axios.post('http://localhost:3001/clientLogin', user) .then(res => { alert(res.data.message) setClientLoginUser(res.data.user) }) return ( <>
Profile
First Name
Last name

NID
Date of Birth(DD/MM/YYYY)
Phone Number

Gender
Medical Information
); } export default Profile;
